name: Helistar Aviation
about: Helistar Aviation, based in Nashville, Tennessee, has been serving the Middle Tennessee area for over five years with a strong commitment to safety. Our team includes pilots with over 180 years of combined experience and more than 145,000 flight hours. We offer a range of courses, including Private Pilot License, Commercial Pilot License, Instrument Rating, and Certified Flight Instructor certifications, all with a focus on helicopters. Located at the John C. Tune Airport, we employ full-time mechanics to ensure our equipment is always in top condition. With a dedicated team of instructors and a Designated Pilot Examiner among our owners, Helistar Aviation is dedicated to providing high-quality aviation training and services. Our priority is safety and service, ensuring you receive the best possible training experience.
